scripts.images: mkdirp assets/images/icons && svgo --config=.svgo.yml -f src/assets/images -o assets/images && svgo --config=.svgo.yml -f src/assets/images/icons -o assets/images/icons
scripts.dev:css: npm run css && postcss assets/css/style.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -o ./style.css && postcss assets/css/*.css --map --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --replace
scripts.build:dev: npm run test && npm run dev:css && npm run dev:js && npm run images
scripts.prod:css: npm run css && postcss assets/css/style.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -o ./style.css && postcss assets/css/*.css --no-map --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --replace
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run prod:css && npm run prod:js && npm run prod:images
scripts.test: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
